entry.string: Your account has been locked for 15 minutes.

entry.translation: Anda mesti bekal satu nama pengguna.

entry.string: Problem logging in: Invalid username or password.
entry.translation: Masalah melog masuk: Nama pengguna atau katalaluan tidak sah.

entry.string: Your account has been terminated by your request or at the adminstrator's discression.
entry.translation: Akaun anda telah ditamatkan atas permintaan anda atau atas budi bicara pentadbir.

entry.string: Your account has been marked as inactive. Contact the adminstrator with further questions.
entry.translation: Akaun anda telah ditanda sebagai tidak aktif. Hubungi pentadbir berserta soalan lanjutan.

entry.string: Problem logging in: Invalid username or password. Your account has been locked for 15 minutes.
Problem logging in: Invalid username or password. You have tried to log in #(1) times.
Your account has not yet been activated by the site administrator
entry.translation: Akaun anda belum lagi diaktifkan oleh pentadbir tapak web
